title: ARCADE 1UP TEEMO SKIN !!!!
body:
{{champion:17}} 
- Rainbow hat
- (has a beard) looks like mario or toad
- green 1up shrooms
- space invader auto attack sounds
- laugh = echo of virtual laughter
- speed boost creates and arcade glitter yellow arrow on the ground
- ride on a black rocket back to base
- comes out of a pipe at base

,-) like it ? vote !


*my familiy and me gets the skin for free right? and btw im rdy to adopted summoners ,-)

replies.body: My wallet is broken, where is the kickstarter for this?
The world needs more adorable Teemo skins to buy
they should make a tanuuki teemo skin

I like it. 
Bu I don't like Teemo.
So I'd be pretty glad if this did not happen.
